name: Brian Taylor

I've created a screenplay database serving the screenwriting community, a comprehensive writing platform with AI integration and real-time collaboration, and specialized rich text editors for creative content. I work across the full stack with modern JavaScript/TypeScript, focusing on scalability and user experience.
fullstack: I build responsive, feature-rich interfaces with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I've created custom text editors with TipTap/ProseMirror, real-time collaboration features, and complex data visualization dashboards. I focus on performance, accessibility, and creating intuitive user experiences.
experience: I've built and deployed multiple production SaaS applications including custom rich text editing platforms, AI-integrated web apps, large scale databases. I'm comfortable working solo or in teams, and I ship fast.
backend: I build RESTful APIs, handle authentication with OAuth, and design database schemas for both SQL and NoSQL. I've architected systems handling file storage with AWS S3, real-time messaging with WebSockets, and AI integration via OpenRouter and OpenAI APIs.
education: Completed an intensive 500+ hour Software Engineering certification covering full-stack development, OOP, MVC frameworks, and agile team collaboration. Though, my real education comes from building projects and solving problems daily.
interests: Outside of coding, I'm deep into developer tooling and content creation platforms. I've built custom TipTap extensions that power real-world writing applications, and I'm always experimenting with AI integration to enhance user experiences.
softSkills: I communicate clearly with both developers and non-technical stakeholders. I work well in teams, adapt quickly to new codebases, and I'm comfortable taking ownership of features from concept to deployment.
